articles.description: The Rothermere family is weighing an offer to take Daily Mail and General Trust Plc (DMGT), the owner of the Daily Mail and MailOnline, private, Sky News reported late on Sunday.
articles.content:
The Rothermere family is weighing an offer to take Daily Mail and General Trust Plc (DMGT), the owner of the Daily Mail and MailOnline, private, Sky News reported late on Sunday.

articles.title: Volvo Trucks plans return to production Monday; new vote set for Wednesday on employment offer - WDBJ7
articles.description: A union vote on the new offer has been scheduled for Wednesday, July 14, from 6:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m.
articles.content:
DUBLIN, Va. (WDBJ) - A new union vote has been set for a proposed employment agreement between Volvo Trucks North America in Dublin and United Auto Workers Local 2069.

articles.author: Ivan Penn, Clifford Krauss, Tamir Kalifa
articles.title: Biden Wants to Embrace Power Lines. Some Americans Disagree. - The New York Times
articles.description: The president and energy companies want new transmission lines to carry electricity from solar and wind farms. Some environmentalists and homeowners are pushing for smaller, more local systems.
articles.content:
Mr. Biden agrees. He even called for new power lines during his presidential campaign.
